text: McCain was a co-sponsor of 2014 law to overhaul Dept. of Veterans Affairs following scandal at VA medical center in Phoenix, where some veterans died while waiting months for appointments. He worked with Bernie Sanders, the bill's co-author, to establish Veterans Choice program.

text:
Democrats complained that Zinke made the trip to boost  GOP candidate, Rick Saccone, who ended up losing special election to Democrat Conor Lamb.
Zinke resigned from Interior in early Jan. amid series of ethics investigations.
author: MatthewDalyWDC

text: AP: Gov't watchdog says ex-Interior Secretary Ryan Zinke didn't engage in illegal political activity when he went to Pa. last year to announce grants just before a special House election. Office of Special Counsel says coal dump site where Zinke appeared was appropriate choice.
author: MatthewDalyWDC

text: Lawmakers from both parties expressed concerns about her past writings about sexual assault. Rao distanced herself from language used as an undergraduate.
author: MatthewDalyWDC

text: AP: Senate confirms WH official Neomi Rao, 53-46, to replace Brett Kavanaugh on DC appeals court. Rao, 45, heads WH regulatory office and plays key role in Trump's efforts to roll back federal rules. She has never tried a case in state or federal court.
author: MatthewDalyWDC

text: Vote was 234-193. No Democrats voted against the bill and no Republicans supported it.
author: MatthewDalyWDC

text: Republicans call bill a Democratic power grab that amounts to a federal takeover of elections. Senate Majority Leader Mitch McConnell says it's dead on arrival in Senate, and White House promised a veto.
author: MatthewDalyWDC

text: AP: House Democrats approve bill aimed at reducing role of big money in politics, ensuring fair elections and strengthening ethics standards. Bills makes it easier to register and vote, tightens election security and requires presidential candidates to disclose  tax returns.
author: MatthewDalyWDC

text: AP: Former New York City Mayor Michael Bloomberg says he is not running for president.The 77-year-old Bloomberg, one of the world's richest men, is expected to be active in the 2020 election. He said Tuesday he'll focus on addressing climate change and gun violence.
author: MatthewDalyWDC

text: Pelosi on gun control bill approved by House Democrats: 'We won a big victory — get the message.'
author: MatthewDalyWDC

text: Bill is the first of two House voting on this week as Dems move to tighten gun laws after 8 years of GOP control. Other bill would extend review period for background check to 10 days. Both bills face dim prospects in Republican-controlled Senate and veto threats from Trump.
author: MatthewDalyWDC

text: AP: House approves measure requiring federal background checks for all firearms sales and transfers, first major gun control legislation by Congress in nearly 25 years. Democrats called the 240-190 vote a major step to end gun lobby's grip on Washington and address gun violence.
author: MatthewDalyWDC

text:
AP: Operative in North Carolina's unresolved House race charged with obstruction & illegal ballot possession related to 2016 and 2018 elections.  
Leslie McCrae Dowless Jr. is accused of conducting illegal 'ballot harvesting' operation by gathering absentee ballots from voters .
author: MatthewDalyWDC

text: AP: Video released under FOIA shows AP reporter @KnickmeyerEllen being shoved by guard at EPA headquarters last year. Kudos to @mbieseck for staying on top of story and especially to Ellen for maintaining her professionalism, as always.
author: MatthewDalyWDC

text: AP: President Trump's former lawyer Michael Cohen is now an ex-lawyer. Cohen was officially disbarred Tues. as he gave closed-door testimony to Senate intell comm. A NY court ruled Cohen's guilty plea last Nov. automatically stripped him of eligibility to practice law.
author: MatthewDalyWDC

text: AP: Senate passes bipartisan border security plan that wd finance 55 add'l miles of fencing along US-Mexico border, significantly less than President Trump wanted. 83-16 vote sends bill to House for vote Thur night that wd send it to Trump to sign to avert another govt shutdown.
author: MatthewDalyWDC

text: Pelosi says if Trump declares national emergency at southern border he's making an 'end run around Congress.' She says there's no crisis that requires a national emergency order and says such a declaration should be met with 'great unease and dismay' as executive overreach.
author: MatthewDalyWDC

text: WASHINGTON (AP) — Senate GOP leader McConnell: Trump has 'indicated he's prepared to sign' funding bill, will declare emergency on border.
author: MatthewDalyWDC

text: @senatemajldr: I agree Mr. President. #Coal is affordable & reliable energy source we can find right here in #Kentucky. It powers lights in our homes & employs thousands of hardworking Kentuckians. Coal has helped fuel our country’s greatness & needs to be part of energy future.
author: MatthewDalyWDC

text: Schumer: 'I would say to our Republican colleagues, this is no game, and it is no joke. Climate change is deadly serious. And the time for all of us to treat it that way is now, before it is too late. '
author: MatthewDalyWDC
